metadata.title: CVE-2024-3374 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An unauthenticated user can trigger a fatal assertion in the server whilegenerating ftdc diagnostic metrics due to attempting to build a BSON objectthat exceeds certain memory sizes. This issue affects MongoDB Server v5.0versions prior to and including 5.0.16 and MongoDB Server v6.0 versionsprior to and including 6.0.5.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
